briefTitle: Remission Evaluation of a Metabolic Intervention in Type 2 Diabetes With Sitagliptin (REMIT-Sita)

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Participants With Hyperglycemia Relapse in the Experimental Group Compared to the Control Group
Number of Participants With Severe Hypoglycemic Episodes
Number of Participants Achieving Drug-free Diabetes Remission
outcomeMeasures.description: Diabetes remission is defined as absence of hyperglycemia relapse

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Participants With Drug-free Normal Glucose Tolerance
outcomeMeasures.description: Normal glucose tolerance is defined as a FPG\<6.1 mmol/L and a 2-hour plasma glucose \<7.8 mmol/L on a 75 g oral glucose tolerance test
